channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- InPost Gallery WordPress Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- InPost Gallery WordPress Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-28666|2023-03-22T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- inpost%20gallery%20wordpress%20plugin
item.description: The InPost Gallery WordPress plugin, in versions < 2.2.2, is affected by a reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability in the 'imgurl' parameter to the add_inpost_gallery_slide_item action, which can only be triggered by an authenticated user.
